Name: Through the night
About the game: Summer has arrived, annoying flies are everywhere, let us become spiders to destroy them, but also a quiet night. 【 Gameplay 】 Press the left mouse button operation spider to destroy the enemy, don't forget to avoid obstacles oh! It is really an easy to use, simple to operate the game ah You drive the spider through various terrains, looking for flies and eating them, and after eating 10 of them you move on to the next level, You will encounter a variety of enemies to consume your life, only three chances, all lost, to start again. Eating 10 flies in the shortest time will earn you more points, be sure to upload points this summer See who gets the most points.
